findings.title: Improper Token Minting
findings.description: $LUCKY is minted without conforming to the tokenomics defined in the documentation.
findings.location: LuckyToken contract, constructor function at line 30

findings.title: Inexplicit Solidity Compiler Version
findings.description: The Solidity compiler version declared in the smart contract was not explicit.
findings.location: LuckyToken contract, pragma solidity statement at line 3
